verbs.description: What [V: ’s] going on at ABC ? During a live break in on Wednesday to cover Donald Trump ’s latest comments on immigration , a network graphic falsely reported that former Trump aide Paul Manafort was guilty of killing five people . As Trump spoke , the ABC chyron claimed : “ Manafort Pleads Guilty to 5 Charges of Manslaughter . ”
